about_the_game:
3 Nights of Terror lets you dive inside the nightmare-driven dreams of police officer Scott Harris, who suffers from an extreme form of Parasomnia. Guide him through his horrifying nightmares, and make sure he wakes up in the morning. 

The Story

Scott Harris is a dedicated police officer at the local Rockville Police Department. Though lately, his life has been consumed by intense parasomnia—a sleep disorder that has left him extremely exhausted.

His hope lies in an experimental brain surgery scheduled in three days. This is his last chance to reclaim control over his mind and escape the horrifying nightmares that plague him. Until then, Harris has to endure three more nights of pure terror.

Every time he falls asleep, he finds himself trapped in surreal, terrifying dreamscapes. With fragmented memories of his police work as his guide, Harris pushes forward, believing that survival will bring him closer to clarity. However, as the nights progress, the nightmares become more vivid and unnervingly real. The line between dream and reality blurs. Who can Harris trust? when even his own mind betrays him??


Night 1: The Maze

Harris wakes up in an underground maze. He needs to find 3 keys to open the exit door, so as to escape his dream. But he has to be careful, because he is not alone.

Night 2: The Hospital

Waking up in his own bed, Harris realizes that something is off about his surroundings. Upon further investigation, he finds himself in a pitch dark hospital. Armed with only a camera, he has to find his way out.

Night 3: The Raid

In his final dream before surgery, Harris gets called in to a potential hostage situation. He has to neutralize all threats on the scene, and rescue the civilians, who have locked themselves into a panic room.

Features:

  • Three unique nightmares: Explore a dark maze, escape a dark hospital, and eliminate unknown entities at an abandoned Homeless Shelter.

  • Simple but intense gameplay: Each level offers different gameplay features to mix things up.

  • Immersive atmosphere: Each nightmare is filled with tension, danger, and mystery.
